list.name: Changes
list.comment:
enhance security, concurrency, and production readiness
- Enforce configurable `maxBodySize` and `maxFileSize` limits on requests to prevent memory exhaustion. - Replace weak session generation with cryptographically secure UUIDs. - Refactor server loop to handle requests concurrently with timeouts using `unawaited`. - Add graceful shutdown mechanism to wait for active requests before closing. - Fix memory leak in `MemoryRateLimitStore` by implementing periodic cleanup of expired keys. - Harden `BaseContainer` error handling to safely catch exceptions within custom handlers. - Add `enableHealthCheck()` endpoint helper and update dependencies.

project.component: { "keyToString": { "Dart Command Line App.bench.dart.executor": "Run", "Dart Command Line App.benchmark.dart.executor": "Run", "Dart Command Line App.dart_express_example.dart.executor": "Debug", "ModuleVcsDetector.initialDetectionPerformed": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.cidr.known.project.marker": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "RunOnceActivity.readMode.enableVisualFormatting": "true", "SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "cf.first.check.clang-format": "false", "cidr.known.project.marker": "true", "dart.analysis.tool.window.visible": "false", "git-widget-placeholder": "main", "kotlin-language-version-configured": "true", "show.migrate.to.gradle.popup": "false" } }

task.summary: refactor: improve routing and middleware handling in DartExpress framework
feat: add benchmarking tool for HTTP requests with latency reporting

enhance security, concurrency, and production readiness
- Enforce configurable `maxBodySize` and `maxFileSize` limits on requests to prevent memory exhaustion. - Replace weak session generation with cryptographically secure UUIDs. - Refactor server loop to handle requests concurrently with timeouts using `unawaited`. - Add graceful shutdown mechanism to wait for active requests before closing. - Fix memory leak in `MemoryRateLimitStore` by implementing periodic cleanup of expired keys. - Harden `BaseContainer` error handling to safely catch exceptions within custom handlers. - Add `enableHealthCheck()` endpoint helper and update dependencies.

option.value:
enhance security, concurrency, and production readiness
- Enforce configurable `maxBodySize` and `maxFileSize` limits on requests to prevent memory exhaustion. - Replace weak session generation with cryptographically secure UUIDs. - Refactor server loop to handle requests concurrently with timeouts using `unawaited`. - Add graceful shutdown mechanism to wait for active requests before closing. - Fix memory leak in `MemoryRateLimitStore` by implementing periodic cleanup of expired keys. - Harden `BaseContainer` error handling to safely catch exceptions within custom handlers. - Add `enableHealthCheck()` endpoint helper and update dependencies.
